Or working in journalism and having to keep up on things I had to read so many newspapers in periodicals and and books about current events I didn't have time to read for pleasure and for a long time I did not read for pleasure I only read for work and I lost my my love of it it was a it became part of a job
And I almost never got to read fiction for a long time until
